com.osfans.trime

接口 KeyboardView.OnKeyboardActionListener

  • 所有已知實現類:
    Trime
    封閉類:
    KeyboardView

    public static interface KeyboardView.OnKeyboardActionListener
    處理按鍵、觸摸等輸入事件

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 實例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和類型 方法和說明
      void onEvent(Event event) 
      void onKey(int primaryCode, int mask)
      Send a key press to the listener.
      void onPress(int primaryCode)
      Called when the user presses a key.
      void onRelease(int primaryCode)
      Called when the user releases a key.
      void onText(CharSequence text)
      Sends a sequence of characters to the listener.
      void swipeDown()
      Called when the user quickly moves the finger from up to down.
      void swipeLeft()
      Called when the user quickly moves the finger from right to left.
      void swipeRight()
      Called when the user quickly moves the finger from left to right.
      void swipeUp()
      Called when the user quickly moves the finger from down to up.

    • 方法詳細資料

      • onPress

        void onPress(int primaryCode)
        Called when the user presses a key. This is sent before the onKey(int, int) is called. For keys that repeat, this is only called once.
        參數:
        primaryCode - the unicode of the key being pressed. If the touch is not on a valid key, the value will be zero.

      • onRelease

        void onRelease(int primaryCode)
        Called when the user releases a key. This is sent after the onKey(int, int) is called. For keys that repeat, this is only called once.
        參數:
        primaryCode - the code of the key that was released

      • onEvent

        void onEvent(Event event)

      • onKey

        void onKey(int primaryCode,
           int mask)
        Send a key press to the listener.
        參數:
        primaryCode - this is the key that was pressed
        mask - the codes for all the possible alternative keys with the primary code being the first. If the primary key code is a single character such as an alphabet or number or symbol, the alternatives will include other characters that may be on the same key or adjacent keys. These codes are useful to correct for accidental presses of a key adjacent to the intended key.

      • onText

        void onText(CharSequence text)
        Sends a sequence of characters to the listener.
        參數:
        text - the sequence of characters to be displayed.

      • swipeLeft

        void swipeLeft()
        Called when the user quickly moves the finger from right to left.

      • swipeRight

        void swipeRight()
        Called when the user quickly moves the finger from left to right.

      • swipeDown

        void swipeDown()
        Called when the user quickly moves the finger from up to down.

      • swipeUp

        void swipeUp()
        Called when the user quickly moves the finger from down to up.
